Reviews.Title: “Great value for money”
Reviews.Author: rajumehta
Reviews.Content: Stayed only for a night but got excellent service. I was upgrade by a very polite receptionist. Al tough the TV remote & iron very not functioning they were replaced instantly. Good location, just 5 minutes from Spinney's and also Burjuman Mall & Karama were nearby. Only fault I could find was there was no phone next to the bed. Also, Wi-fi was complimentary. Will definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Good value stay”
Reviews.Author: MohDoh
Reviews.Content: It's a decent apartment style hotel in Dubai. The location is not too bad; the metro is about 10 minute walk. But, there's nothing exciting around. The room is spacious with separate laundry room, kitchen, living room and bed room. It's good value for sure. There were some families staying on the same floor, and the kids and people were making loud noises, which the hotel didn't do anything about it. Plus, the floor was always smelly from cooking from other rooms. Also, I could hear street noise from the street pretty noticeably. I also didn't get my wake up call on time and could have missed my flight. Breakfast was nothing to write about. Swimming pool wasn't heated and couldn't be used. But, the staff were kind. Again, it's a decent value for the money.

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: rosiewillow
Reviews.Content: We arrived at the hotel at 12noon and were able to check in straight away. The staff we met were all pleasant and helpful. Suite 1401 was large, clean and comfortable. It consisted of a living room with sofas, TV and dining table, a large fitted kitchen, a large bedroom with en-suite bathroom, a cloakroom and utility room. Ideal for an extended stay. The kitchen included all utensils, a new fridge/freezer, microwave and 2 ring hob. The location s great as it is about 400metres from Al Karama metro station, has a bus stop right outside and a large supermarket within a 10 minute walk. It is a 10 minute car ride from Dubai airport. The only negative is that breakfast is only served from 8am.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, good location, great staff!”
Reviews.Author: jcerovac
Reviews.Content: The hotel is not the posh 5+ (er, um, "7 star") one might find elsewhere in Dubai; but then, it is also reasonably priced, clean, and a good value for the Dirham. It is in a good location, on Kuwait Street, which gives easy access to taxis, buses, and a short walk to the Dubai Metro. The pool is comfortable if not a little small, and the gym is little more than a walk-in closet with a bench, treadmill, and bike; but it is still quite functional. The sauna is comfortable and all of the facilities are kept clean by the friendly and helpful staff. All in all, this is a recommended hotel for price, cleanliness, and service.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly and personal touch in Dubai”
Reviews.Author: leonardmaximillian
Reviews.Content: I booked online and can recommend this little hotel although it is not directly on the main Sheikh Zayed road - which is not bad either because it guarantees a good nights rest) it is nevertheless only a few minutes from the exhibiton centre -which is where I wanted to be and the Burjuman Shopping Centre and Dubai Mall is also very near by. Staff are friendly and very helpful, although I had to wait on arrival but I suppose it was due to me being early. For me it was great - Free internet, Great suite and nice pool- all at a great price! I will be back when again in Dubai no question!

Reviews.Title: “Great Potential needs more management”
Reviews.Author: JBL0
Reviews.Content: We book online through trip advisor site On arrival and checking we found that our card had already been debited as a no show, this was done the day prior to our arrival date, The room was spacious and reasonbly clean , the self catering kitchen had no utensils or crokery , we where informed the previous resident had stolen the items, we made do with what they could give us. Breakfast was a disaster, one sausage one egg some toast and coffe. The adverts on the web site and in the hotel offered Shuttle transport to shops and beach, Kiddies club non of which were avaiable. The management mostly new were friendly but unable to help. The location is difficult as it is not really close to any amenities 1000 metres to Metro okay in winter not good in summer. Very few taxis new the location and we relied on our own guidance in many cases. Overhaul it is spacious the lifts work but the facilities need some work.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Place to stay while in Dubai”
Reviews.Author: SEOKOJIE
Reviews.Content: The hotel is excellent for those wishing to visit Dubai. Its proximity to various places of interest in Dubai makes it a perfect place to stay. The staff are very courteous and friendly. The hotel is well located in Bur Dubai

Reviews.Title: “Great place for a cool holiday”
Reviews.Author: mariatripmuscat
Reviews.Content: It was a fantastic break, and the credit goes to my stay at Bavaria Executive Suites. The apartment was very comfortable. In fact we felt like staying indoors rather than sightseeing, and extended our stay by one more night. Wish we could stay longer. I will definitely come back to Bavaria during my next visit to DXB. I have already recommended your hotel to many of my colleagues and friends. Your staff at reception and housekeeping is very courteous and professional.

HotelInfo.Name: Bavaria Executive Suites Bur Dubai
HotelInfo.Address: Al Mankhool Road Kuwait Street | PO Box 500589, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
